title: How to Pomp a Pompadour | AXE | Instagroom
description:
This is how Ned keeps it real: step by step, pomp by pump. 

THE STEPS:
1. Blow-dry 
2. Rub pomade on hands
3. Rake through hair
4. Pump it up with a comb

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: If you’re being authentic in what you’re doing, then what you’re wearing will look cool anyway. So I blow dry my hair, and I get some pomade, I rub it into my hands. Rake the pomade through my hair and I just pump it up with the comb. There’s no exact science to it, but you kinda know it when you see it.
